content:
CP 619 T Firestop putty roll Easily moldable firestop tape designed to help prevent fire and smoke from spreading through large openings ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop putties- - - ### FEATURES:Features Helps to improve the firestop performance for wide range of applications – large openings, cable trays, telecom cables Quick and simple to install – applied by hand and no tools required Reusable For use with board and frame kit Mold and mildew resistant Applications For use with firestop board and frame kit Telecom and datacom applications Cable trays For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Color: Red Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84): Flame spread: 15Smoke development: 10 LEED VOC: 2 g/l Technical Data | Color | Red | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 15
Smoke development: 10 | LEED VOC | 2 g/l | Application temperature range | 32 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Product Class | Ultimate | Approx. Density | 100 lb/ft³ ### ITEMS- 305072 - Putty tape CP 619T 1x12 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CP 619T 1x12 Firestop putty tape - 305073 - Putty tape CP 619T 1x12 (case of 12) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x CP 619T 1x12 Firestop putty tape
